text: The 2011 Asian Judo Championships were held at UAE WJJ Federation Hall in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates from 5 April to 7 April 2011. ==Medal summary== ===Men=== {| |- |rowspan=2|Extra lightweight −60 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Half lightweight −66 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Lightweight −73 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Half middleweight −81 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Middleweight −90 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Half heavyweight −100 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Heavyweight +100 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Team |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |} ===Women=== {| |- |rowspan=2|Extra lightweight −48 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Half lightweight −52 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Lightweight −57 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Half middleweight −63 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Middleweight −70 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Half heavyweight −78 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Heavyweight +78 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Team |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |} ==Medal table== ==External links== *Men's Results *Women's Results A Asian Judo Championships Category:Asian Judo Championships Category:International sports competitions hosted by the United Arab Emirates Category:Sports competitions in Abu Dhabi Category:21st century in Abu Dhabi Category:Judo competitions in the United Arab Emirates
